name: condition-clinical-pastIllness
description: The subset of http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-clinical for past illness

concept.display: The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition or there is no longer evidence of the condition.
The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition and there is a negligible perceived risk of the symptoms returning.
The subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition, but there is a risk of the symptoms returning.
